Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Paul A Galatis
Reviews.Content: great imagesgood functionscould be a little smallerwould like to be able to access the tripple auto HDR images to customize the resultsfor anybody that need more than a "pocket camera" to limited Pro use

Reviews.Title: wonderful  camera
Reviews.Author: fdrake
Reviews.Content: A wonderful camera which is easy to use and makes terrific images, both in black and white and color.  The mobile LCD screen is very helpful.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0MP APS-C CMOS Sensor, ISO 100-12800, Expandable to 25600 and DIGIC 5 Image Processor for high speed and excellent image quality
3.0" Vari-angle touch screen LCD flips out and tilts for viewing from a wide variety of angles. Operation is highly intuitive and allows you to control your focus points from the LCD
9-Point All Cross-Type AF System and Full HD Movie Mode with Continuous AF for shooting photos and videos in Live Mode
Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S Lenses
8 GB SD Memory Card & Extra Battery
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T4i Digital SLR Camera Body with 8 GB SD Memory Card & Extra Battery
